en-US.summary: This skill is for the finding the restaurants
en-US.name: foodpedia
en-US.description: Locates the food outlets near to your places

en-GB.summary: foodpedia.uk gives you best restaurants you can choose to eat in or take away, a restaurant search personalised for you.
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell foodpedia to search for fish and chips
Alexa, ask foodpedia get me the best restaurant near to me
en-GB.name: foodpedia
en-GB.description:
Foodpedia 

Welcome to foodpedia Skill for Alexa, your online restaurant finder! Our search algorithms at Foodpedia trying out hundreds of restaurants and recipes to give you the best best restaurants to match your preferences.

Once you've enabled foodpedia, you can start by saying 'Alexa, open foodpedia'.
